name: Ghost Diff Generator
description: Generates Time Rift comparisons showing retro vs modern solutions

action.message:
Generate a new Time Rift comparison example for the backend/src/utils/timerift.js module. Create a side-by-side comparison showing:

1. How a selected ghost would solve a problem using era-specific constraints
2. How the same problem would be solved with modern best practices
3. Educational commentary highlighting the evolution

Ensure the retro solution strictly follows the persona's formatting and limitations from persona-consistency.md.
